Managing Director and Vice President Elections The Managing Director PRC Committee met this week to elect individuals to Managing Director and Vice President positions These employees are recognized as outstanding contributors to the organization whose individua l efforts have been instrumental in the continued success and growth of the company We are pleased to announce the election of the
